/usr/bin/c++   -O2 -g -DNDEBUG    CMakeFiles/chapter08.dir/noisetex.cpp.o CMakeFiles/chapter08.dir/main.cpp.o CMakeFiles/chapter08.dir/scenesky.cpp.o CMakeFiles/chapter08.dir/scenedecay.cpp.o CMakeFiles/chapter08.dir/scenenightvision.cpp.o CMakeFiles/chapter08.dir/scenepaint.cpp.o CMakeFiles/chapter08.dir/scenewood.cpp.o CMakeFiles/chapter08.dir/scenenoise.cpp.o  -o chapter08 -rdynamic ../ingredients/libingredients.a /usr/local/lib/libglfw3.a -lGL -lpthread -lXrandr -lXxf86vm -lXi -lrt
